description: Provides Amazon EMR release label details, such as the releases available the Region where the API request is run, and the available applications for a specific Amazon EMR release label. Can also list Amazon EMR releases that support a specified version of Spark.

nested_items.name: ReleaseLabel
nested_items.description: The target release label described in the response.

nested_items.name: Applications
nested_items.description: The list of applications available for the target release label. Name is the name of the application. Version is the concise version of the application.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The returned release label application name. For example, hadoop.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The returned release label application version. For example, 3.2.1.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token. Reserved for future use. Currently set to null.

nested_items.name: AvailableOSReleases
nested_items.description: The list of available Amazon Linux release versions for an Amazon EMR release. Contains a Label field that is formatted as shown in Amazon Linux 2 Release Notes. For example, 2.0.20220218.1.

nested_items.name: Label
nested_items.description: The Amazon Linux release specified for a cluster in the RunJobFlow request. The format is as shown in Amazon Linux 2 Release Notes. For example, 2.0.20220218.1.
